desc: Authentik is repurposed, vintage, unique, authentically crafted furniture from the past. Located in downtown Las Vegas Arts District. Curated by Chef Natalie Young, Owner of eat. & Old Soul located in the World Market Center.

layout.text: Textiles, plants and alchemy inspired by travel, culture, music, arts and spirituality. Located in downtown Las Vegas Arts District. Design and Creative space curated by Rove Designs and Chef Natalie Young (chef/owner of eat. & Old Soul).
